Towanda Area School District intends to return to regular school days and hours on August 27, for the upcoming 2020-2021 school year. This survey is designed to provide feedback to the administration in preparation for all educational options for the upcoming year. Answering this survey with your initial preference does not lock your child into any particular option. This is a preliminary fact finding effort as we look for your opinion.

Parents/guardians please complete this form on behalf of your student(s). Questions should be directed to your child's building principal.
